an6.106:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these three kinds of craving, and these three kinds of conceit, that are to be abandoned.Another composite six.What are the three kinds of craving that are to be abandoned? () Sensual craving, (2) craving for existence, and (3) craving for extermination: these are the three kinds of craving that are to be abandoned. And what are the three kinds of conceit that are to be abandoned? (4) Conceit, (5) the inferiority complex, and (6) arrogance: these are the three kinds of conceit that are to be abandoned.
